name: Renekton

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Reign of Anger
passive.description: Innate:  Renekton's  basic attacks  on-hit and  ability hits generate  Fury, which continually expires after a period without fighting. He generates bonus Fury while below half health.
passive.description_source:
Basic attacks against any enemy that is not a structure will generate the Fury.
Renekton can generate Fury by collecting  Honeyfruit and Health Relics (interacts with Reign of Anger's bonus generation).
PENDING FOR TEST: Fury generation with parrying effects ( blind,  dodge,  block)

basic_ability_1.name: Cull the Meek
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Renekton cleaves around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. He also generates Fury and  heals for each enemy hit, increased against  champions.
basic_ability_1.description_source: Healing modifiers such as  Spirit Visage and  Grievous Wounds take effect after Cull the Meek's healing cap.

basic_ability_2.name: Ruthless Predator
basic_ability_2.description: Active:  Renekton's next basic attack within a few seconds will strike twice, dealing modified physical damage and briefly  stunning the target.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
Each strike of Ruthless Predator deals  basic damage, but the first strike also triggers spell effects by also being tagged as  spell damage.
If the target becomes  untargetable or  dies during the empowered attack's cast time, it is cancelled but not consumed.
The empowered attack will not trigger against  structures.
The first two attacks of the  empowered version will generate fury.(bug)
The third attack will remove any fury gained since the first attack.
This includes fury generated via  Dominus.(bug)
This will fail to remove fury gained through a  Guinsoo's Rageblade's Phantom Hit which has triggered on the first attack.(bug)
This will not fail to remove fury gained through  Dusk and Dawn's Spellblade.
Even if empowered Ruthless Predator is blocked by a  spell shield, it will still destroy any existing damage  shields on the target.
Ruthless Predator does not cause Renekton to attack twice/thrice. Effects that trigger  on-attack or interact with the attack windup will only trigger once and thus do not interact with Ruthless Predator. (e.g.  Lethal Tempo,  Hail of Blades).

basic_ability_3.name: Slice and Dice
basic_ability_3.description: Active - Slice:  Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through.

ultimate.name: Dominus
ultimate.description: Active:  Renekton empowers himself for some time, gaining Fury,  bonus health, bonus size,  bonus attack range, and increased area on  Cull the Meek.
ultimate.description_source:
Dominus'  cooldown is not refunded if Renekton  dies during the cast animation.
Dominus' bonus health gain does not interact with  Spirit Visage or  Grievous Wounds.
Renekton retains Dominus' bonus health (if not over his normal maximum) once the duration ends.
